name: whatsapp-web-monorepo
description: Aplicação WhatsApp Web completa com backend Node.js e frontend React

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && npm run setup-backend
scripts.test: npm run test-backend && npm run test-frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean-backend && npm run clean-frontend
scripts.clean-frontend: cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json build

author: Gian
